name: Ball vs Rope: Escape from Hell
name_original: Ball vs Rope: Escape from Hell
description:
The character, lost soul, is literally caught in a loop by a demonic rope preventing it from escaping Hell

== CONTROLS ==

Press  LMB to aim, release LMB to shoot

Kill the red shapes hitting their sides

Avoid the angles... or die

== STORY ==

Sometimes the souls meant to Heaven don't go there. They are being caught in a loop of a demonic rope and dragged straight to Hell. They give up and stay there forever, tied to a pillar of despair.

But not this one

This brave little soul will fight the demons, gain power from eath victory and one day finally become strong enough to rip the rope and break free.

But... How many demonic ropes are there?..
